trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCGILTOCOIN_00240_TALK_ACTOR<tab>Welcome to the Gold Saucer! If you're looking to exchange your ordinary old gil for shiny new MGP, then you've come to the right place. What do you say?
TEXT_CMNGSCGILTOCOIN_00240_ERROR_GIL<tab>I'm sorry, but it seems you lack the necessary funds to conduct the transaction. Might I suggest checking your coinpurse for holes?
TEXT_CMNGSCGILTOCOIN_00240_ERROR_COIN_MAX<tab>Oh ho! It would seem you're already carrying a sizable sum of MGP, dear customer. If you're looking for more, you'll have to earn it for yourself!
TEXT_CMNGSCGILTOCOIN_00240_ERROR_COIN_MAX_SYSTEM_000<tab>Use of the exchange service is restricted to patrons with less than 500 MGP in their possession.
TEXT_CMNGSCGILTOCOIN_00240_ERROR_COIN_MAX_SYSTEM_001<tab>Additional MGP may be won from the numerous events and attractions available in the Gold Saucer. May the Spinner smile upon you!
